HEATS UP EXTRA FAST

WORKS ON ALL HAIR TYPES

Men's hair clippers designed for smooth, quick, and precise clipping performance on all types of hair with high quality long lasting high-carbon enhanced self-sharpening precision premium titanium stainless T-blades, The tip part adopts safe R outlining obtuse angle design, the professional edgers clippers satisfy any styling needs, such as lining, sculpt contours, and dry shaving.

Powerful motor and High carbon-reinforced self-sharp precision stainless steel sharp blade enable easy and quick cut without getting stuck in hair. Provides smooth, fast, and precise trimming performance for all types of hair without entanglement the hair. And help you create various hairstyles.

 


Zero Gapped Trimmer

Equipped with 3 different length restriction combs (1mm 2mm 3mm) to cut out the length you want. Perfectly groom the edges of your hair. The wireless zero-gap trimmer hair clipper also includes a USB cable and a cleaning brush.
USB Rechargeable Cordless Trimmer--1600mAh Lithium-ion battery delivers over 200 minutes of nonstop run time; charges in just 3-4 hours. The USB cable can compatible with any USB charger interface. You can walk away from the charger while using maximum mobility and convenience.


Ergonomic easy to hold and use

The hair clipper weighs only 208 grams and measures 15.3*4.1 cm. It can be used by men and women. You can hold the hair clipper for a long time without feeling tired, and the one-button design is convenient to use. Mute the generator to reduce the noise during use.


Quality Assurance

We provide 12 months of free replacement warranty and friendly customer service. If you have any questions during use, please feel free to contact us. We will fully pay attention to you and provide you with a 100% satisfactory solution.

Hair Clippers - Gifts for Men

Our cordless men's hair clipper and beard trimmer with a powerful motor and low noise structure have a load torque motor and durable titanium ceramic blades. Designed for exquisite trimming, they are durable and easy. so we use it as a cordless zero-gapped trimmer for oil heads. A Professional barber can use it with different sizes of guide comb to make various hairstyles. Very suitable gifts for men.

It would not hurt your skin or get entangled in the hair, and help you create various hairstyles. Come with 4 X Replaceable Limit Combs (1.5mm, 3mm, 6mm, 9mm). Considerate haircutting kit.

-The Ideal Gift For A Loved One

Giving a practical and stylish gift for men in life not only saves time and money but also makes beauticians look refreshed! It is an ideal holiday gift for a father, son, boyfriend, and loved ones.

entry.title: Ion Pure™ Ionic Detox Foot Bath Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Foot Care
Price: 108.98

How The Ionic Detox Works

How Can The Ion Pure Heal My Body? from Gear Elevation on Vimeo.

Description  
Water is resolved into a large amount of energy ion through ion cleanse device (positive and negative), make internal cell vigor strengthen, promote various enzymes live. Detoxification improves the human body organ circulating function and accelerates metabolism, makes the human body get well gradually. Through the color that demonstrates, you can understand more about your own health.

Ions are molecules that in most cases carry either a positive or negative charge. When the machine is turned on ions are created in the water. When the unit is set to positive, the current is directed to the positive pole, which produces more negative ions in the water inducing a positive polarity that generates a negative ion flow which raises blood pH from acidic toward alkaline in scientific studies. Using the machine regularly can moderate the incretion system, balance the PH and keep your body systems in working order.
Features:
Very easy to operate, you just need to sit down and relax for the duration of the treatment.
You may also see deposits floating on top of the water, this can be a result of the reaction between the array and saline solution.
At the end of 30 minutes, you will sound a buzzer intermittently. The light will flash four times to indicate work has finished.
The tub color is white which makes it easier to view the color changes of the water. Hard plastic casing with a high-quality finish is durable.
Power: 25W

Benefits of detoxification:
Enhance the immune system.
Balance blood sugar and pressure.
Improve memory and sleep.
Improve metabolism, reinforce immunity, remove inferior health.
Balance blood fat and pressure alleviate gout, rheumatism, and injuries.
The machine protects the inner and outer deeply and detoxifies the kinds of toxins.

Color Key for Detoxification Process:
Yellow-green Detoxifying from the kidney, bladder urinary tract, female prostate
Orange Detoxifying from joints.
Brown Detoxifying liver, tobacco, cellular debris.
Black Detoxifying gallbladder.
Dark Green Detoxifying gallbladder.
White Foam Mucus from lymph.
White Speckles Mostly yeast.
Black Speckles Heavy metals.
Red Speckles Blood clot material.

Package includes:
1x control unit.
1x superior foot tub.
2x array.
1x Spoon
1x Power cord
1x User manual.

Note: When the watercolor will change with or without feet in Because the ions have reacted with other substances in the water, the water will be changed without feet. When your feet in, the reaction will be stronger, the color will darker

Why do so many people like the ionic foot spa machine?

We are a company which is specialized in detoxification machines, beauty accessories. We have a professional Product Research, design, and manufacturing team.

An economical and practical detoxification system ion detox spa machine, you deserve to have one!

  • Upgrade detox machine utilizing the characteristics of water to split it into Positive and Negative ions, and the negative ions pull out the toxin from your feet. This detoxification method is most effective and gentle.
  • One Button to Start is better for the elderly and parents.
  • Detox and strengthen your immune system

Pay attention:
The machine is safe to use by most people, except maybe in the case of.
During pregnancy (suspected pregnancy).
People with a pacemaker.
People with epilepsy.
People with implanted organs or steel plates or joints.
People with low blood pressure should eat before using the machine. The machine may decrease sugar.

2+ 15% off

WHY STRUGGLE TO GET INTO YOUR FAVORITE OUTFIT EVER AGAIN?

“This really smoothes out my curves! It is so well made, so comfortable, gorgeous material, easy to put on, so I fit in my favorite dress.” - Ruby L.

Order notice:

Please read the following size chart, the better to help you choose your size!!!

 

FEATURES:

  • Shapes the tummy, hips, buttocks, and thighs at the same time
  • Chafe-free thigh control
  • High waisted design covering entire tummy and mid to low back
  • 3D buttock push-up for a wonderfully shaped rear and hips
  • Effective abdomen and waistline compression
  • Shoulder straps prevent riding up or rolling down
  • Post-surgical shaping recovery
  • Made of comfortable and breathable elastic material
  • Speeds up postpartum recovery
  • Ideal for weddings, dates, proms, clubs, festivals, trips, work, and daily use


You deserve to dress effortlessly. You deserve to feel confident and beautiful. You deserve FitsMe™ Colombian Bodysuit.

This is the world's first bodysuit designed to shape, smooth, and accentuate your silhouette while giving you an enhanced push-up effect without sacrificing comfort.

Ideal for date nights, special occasions, or anytime you want to feel more confident in your favorite dress, FitsMe gives you the best outcome you need. It adapts to your every curve, and slips under even the tightest dress, and remains invisible all day without pinching or binding. And with our unique design, you can go to the bathroom as usual!

Designed and advised for Post-Partum and Post-Surgical. 

OUR MOST FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:

Q. Why should I buy this figure shaper from you?

A: FitsMe™ Colombian Bodysuit helps you feel comfortable, confident, and stylish in your clothes no matter what your size. We take pride in our products, our customer service, and making your experience shopping with us the best it can be.

Q. Can I wear this postpartum or post-surgical?

A: Absolutely, initially these are designed for these occasions. Speed up recovery and help shaping after liquid reduction. 

Q. Does it roll up or down when walking or doing chores?

A: Not at all! This bodysuit hugs your figure for a perfect fit that does not roll up, and the shoulder straps make sure it never slides down, even when you are dancing or working out!

Q: Can I wear this to bed?

A: Yes, the stretch fabric is chafe-free and comfortable enough for all-night wear!

Q: Can I go to the bathroom wearing this shapewear?

A: Of course! When you wear other bodysuits, you going to the bathroom is a hassle unless you take that off completely. But not in ours! We designed FitsMe so you can go to the bathroom whenever you want!

Q: When is the best time to wear FitsMe?

A: This bodysuit lets you look and feel your best every day, whether you have an important job interview, are attending a wedding, or out on the town with friends

Specifications:

  • Material: 70% Nylon, 30% Spandex

Important note: This is not a weight-loss product. A healthy diet or exercise is necessary if your goal is weight loss or gain. This product ONLY helps shape your figure.
